channel.title: Improve my usergroup tags(images/w.e. they're called)
channel.description:
Sorry it's a screenshot (didn't want to change the text to black so it was easier to see on this forum theme). I really could do with some improvements lol
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/k363cm.png[/img]

item.title: Improve my usergroup tags(images/w.e. they're called)
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Good concept. The only thing I’d change is make the font color different for every group and add a background to them. Make the background simple. Make it a boring color with scan lines in the background or something. They are called userbars btw

Read full topic
item.source: Improve my usergroup tags(images/w.e. they're called)
